Package fr.utt.lo02.projet.modele.mode

Class ModeJeu

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
fr.utt.lo02.projet.modele.mode.ModeJeu
All Implemented Interfaces:
Element
Direct Known Subclasses:
ModeAdvanced, ModeNormal
public abstract class ModeJeu
extends java.util.Observable
implements Element
Abstract class of game mode. At the same time, it is the interviewee of the calculator. And the observed.
Author:
Dewen and Fulin

    • etreTermine

      public boolean etreTermine()
      Determine whether the game is over. 
       When the number of players equals 2, there are 15 cards on the table; or when
 the number of players equals 3, there are 14 cards on the table.
      Returns:
      true if the game is over
